system.description:
Conjures thick, sticky webs that fill a 20-foot cube, heavily obscuring the area and restraining creatures that enter.

Scaling: At dice count 3, webs are fireproof. At dice count 6, creates 40-foot cube. At dice count 9, webs are stronger and harder to escape. At dice count 12, webs deal damage to restrained creatures. At dice count 15, creates a massive web network covering 100 feet.
